text: <s>[INST] User: Book a service appointment for my Toyota Camry next Monday. [/INST] Sure! I can schedule your Toyota Camry service for Monday. Would you like a morning or afternoon slot?</s>
<s>[INST] User: Find the nearest Toyota service center in Chicago. [/INST] The closest Toyota service center is Toyota on Western Avenue, about 3 miles from downtown Chicago.</s>
<s>[INST] User: Can you remind me to change oil every 5,000 miles? [/INST] Absolutely! Iâ€™ve added a reminder to change your oil every 5,000 miles.</s>
<s>[INST] User: How long does a standard car service take? [/INST] A standard Toyota service usually takes about 1.5 to 2 hours depending on your vehicle condition.</s>
<s>[INST] User: What should I bring to the appointment? [/INST] Please bring your car keys, registration, and service records if available.</s>
